    WoLQS

    A workshop on localisation in quantum systems, running on the 1st & 2nd of June, 2017

    • Strand Campus,
      King's College London
    • Register
    • Email

    This workshop has occured. Lecture capture and slides are available here

     
    A two-day workshop on concepts and applications of localisation in quantum systems. The workshop takes place at King's College London on June 1st-2nd 2017. Workshop poster

    Invited speakers:

    Vladimir Dobrosavljević (Florida State University): Localisation in Dynamical Mean Field Theory
    Vladimir Kravtsov (ICTP Trieste): Anderson localisation on graphs
    Zlatko Papić (Leeds University): Many-Body localisation
